meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Welcome to my groovy review of Paper Trail, where we're gonna get foldy with some fantastic puzzle-solving, a dash of whimsy, and maybe even a pinch of sass. Buckle up, fellow gamers!

As I delved into this charming indie game, I couldn't help but notice the delightful artistry and attention to detail that went into crafting its unique world. Imagine being transported to a realm where origami meets top-down puzzle-solving, with an atmospheric soundtrack that'll make you feel like you're floating on a cloud of paper-thin tranquility!

Now, let's get to those critics! Metro GameCentral gave it a score of 70, praising the game for having "just enough intricacy" without feeling too overwhelming. Push Square chimed in with an 80, calling Paper Trail "charming" and commending its "interesting and unique puzzle mechanic." PlayStation Universe went all-in with a 95, raving about the game's passion, craftsmanship, and emotional resonance. GameSpew, however, brought it back down to earth with a 70, stating that the puzzles might be an acquired taste and could become tiresome.

Finger Guns offered up an 80, praising the game's design and visuals while acknowledging the story might be a bit formulaic. GAMINGbible went full-throttle with a 90, declaring it their favorite indie game of the year (so far!). And last but not least, Softpedia gave it a 75, highlighting its immersive experience and puzzle-solving thrills.

So, what's my take on Paper Trail? Well, let me fold myself into this review: I think it's an absolute blast! The art is stunning, the puzzles are engaging (if not occasionally challenging), and the soundtrack is simply delightful. Sure, there might be some minor quibbles with the story or hint system, but overall, I'm hooked!

In conclusion, Paper Trail is a must-play for anyone looking for a unique puzzle-solving experience that'll wrap you up in its whimsical world. So grab your favorite snack (maybe some popcorn and a side of origami paper?), settle in, and get ready to fold yourself into this groovy adventure!
